story.title: Our Story

hero.title: Changelog from my journey
hero.description: I've been working on Aceternity for the past 2 years. Here's a timeline of my journey.

timeline.content: Built and launched Aceternity UI and Aceternity UI Pro from scratch

timeline.title: Early 2023
timeline.content: I usually run out of copy, but when I see content this big, I try to integrate lorem ipsum. Lorem ipsum is for people who are too lazy to write copy. But we are not. Here are some more example of beautiful designs I built.

timeline.title: Changelog
timeline.content:
Deployed 5 new components on Aceternity today
✅ Card grid component
✅ Startup template Aceternity
✅ Random file upload lol
✅ Himesh Reshammiya Music CD
✅ Salman Bhai Fan Club registrations open
